text.text_translated:
George Lucas made films. He used a special story idea. It is called "the hero's journey." This idea has 17 steps. George Lucas used these steps for his stories.

Usually, a hero lives a normal life. But then something happens. It tells them to go on an adventure. This adventure makes everything different.

First, in Star Wars, Luke lives a normal life. He lives with his aunt and uncle. He fixes robots.

He finds a message. It is from Princess Leia. It is for Obi-Wan Kenobi. It is in the robot R2D2. This message is the call to adventure. It starts his trip.
